block.p: GOLDSTEIN-Samuel, on May 17th at the age of 83. Devoted and loving father to Stuart and Michael (Fran), brother to Harry and Abraham, cherished grandfather to Stephanie, Matthew, Amanda and Matthew, brother-in-law Nat and sister-in-law Rose. In lieu of flowers donations to the Parkinson Disorder Foundation at 710 West 168th St., New York, NY. Services today, 12:30PM at Temple Judea of Manhasset, 333 Searington Rd.
